|chip1 = Intersil;ISL3887; |chip2 = Intersil;; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "MADE IN TAIWAN" and an '''[[Arcadyan]]''' / '''[[Accton]]''' P/N is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is shown pictured with a '''[[Conexant]]''' GW3887IK MAC/BB ('''[[Intersil]]''' ISL3887) in the FCC photos. A MAC label affixed to the back of the device in the same pictures has an OUI of 00:30:F1 ('''Accton''').
[[Category:English Documentation]]
